citation.abstract: Incidence rates for internal carotid artery dissection (ICAD) have been reported to be 2.6 to 2.9 per 100,000, but reliable epidemiologic data for vertebral artery dissection (VAD) are not available.
citation.title: Incidence and outcome of cervical artery dissection A population-based study

blogs.title: Congressman Mark Kirk Suffers Stroke
blogs.summary:
From the Chicago Tribune today: A Kirk spokesperson says the 52-year-old senator checked himself into Lake Forest Hospital. He was transferred to Northwestern, where tests showed he'd suffered a stroke.

wikipedia.title: Carotid artery dissection
wikipedia.summary: Carotid artery dissection is a separation of the layers of the artery wall supplying oxygen-bearing blood to the head and brain and is the most common cause of stroke in young adults.
